phrs.translation: 人身保护权；人身保护法

sentences.sentence: Useable embryo recovery was significantly low in ewes of corpora lutea degradation.
sentences.translation: 在黄体降解的母羊中，可用的胚胎恢复率非常低。

sentences.sentence: Large corpora (masses of text) are a good place to start.
sentences.translation: 通过大型语料库(海量文本)来检查是个好方法。

sentences.sentence: This in turn will cause a decrease in overall medical costs in Corpora.
sentences.translation: 这又将会导致Corpora总体医疗费用的下降。
